body: Man, I love HK manhwa <---- that's the right way to call these. But, WHO THE FUCK LOAD UP THIS IN A FUCKING HENTAI SITE? MOTHERFUCKER SHOULD BE BANNED.
Who the hell post a HK fantasy Comic ? cant see the connection with erotic.
The doujin looks like a combination of Guilty Gear, King of Fighters, Street Fighter, Dragon Ball Z and more...
